statements.statement:
select A.* , C.TRANGTHAI as STATUS, C.SOTIEPNHAN, A.ICD_BENHCHINH as ICD_NHAPVIEN, C.SOBHYT, C.BHYTTUNGAY, C.BHYTDENNGAY from TT_NOITRU_BENHAN A inner join TT_TIEPNHAN C on C.TIEPNHAN_ID = A.TIEPNHAN_ID inner join TT_BENHNHAN B on A.BENHNHAN_ID = B.BENHNHAN_ID and B.ACTIVE = '1' and B.MAYTE = '$MAYTE$' where (A.TRANGTHAI = 'DANGDIEUTRI' OR A.TRANGTHAI = 'DAXUATVIEN' OR A.TRANGTHAI = 'DATHANHTOAN') and A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'

select A.* , C.TRANGTHAI as STATUS, C.SOTIEPNHAN, A.ICD_BENHCHINH as ICD_NHAPVIEN from TT_NOITRU_BENHAN A inner join TT_TIEPNHAN C on C.TIEPNHAN_ID = A.TIEPNHAN_ID and convert(date, C.NGAYTAO) = convert(date, getdate()) inner join TT_BENHNHAN B on A.BENHNHAN_ID = B.BENHNHAN_ID and B.ACTIVE = '1' and B.MAYTE = '$MAYTE$' where A.TRANGTHAI = 'DAKHOA' and A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU order by THONGTINCAPCUU_ID

select TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.*, tn.SOTIEPNHAN from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on tn.TIEPNHAN_ID = TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.TIEPNHAN_ID
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THONGTINCAPCUU_ID = '$THONGTINCAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.SOCAPCUU = '$SOCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYCAPCUU = '$NGAYCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANCAPCUU = '$THOIGIANCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NOICAPCUU_ID = '$NOICAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NOINHAPVIEN_ID = '$NOINHAPVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BACSICAPCUU_ID = '$BACSICAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.CHANDOANNGT = '$CHANDOANNGT$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.KETQUACAPCUU_ID = '$KETQUACAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.KHOANHAPVIEN_ID = '$KHOANHAPVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYNHAPVIEN = '$NGAYNHAPVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANNHAPVIEN = '$THOIGIANNHAPVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE = '$ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA = '$ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_RAVIEN_CODE = '$ICD_RAVIEN_CODE$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA = '$ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.CHUYENVIEN_ID = '$CHUYENVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYRAVIEN = '$NGAYRAVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANRAVIEN = '$THOIGIANRAVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
order by THONGTINCAPCUU_ID
select * from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU where TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.SOCAPCUU = '$SOCAPCUU$' AND TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' order by THONGTINCAPCUU_ID
select * from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU where TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THONGTINCAPCUU_ID = '$value$' order by THONGTINCAPCUU_ID
select * from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU where TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THONGTINCAPCUU_ID = '$THONGTINCAPCUU_ID$' order by THONGTINCAPCUU_ID
statements.insert: insert into TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU ( SOCAPCUU , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , LUUTRU_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , NGAYCAPCUU , THOIGIANCAPCUU , NOICAPCUU_ID , NOINHAPVIEN_ID , BACSICAPCUU_ID , CHANDOANNGT , KETQUACAPCUU_ID , GHICHU , KHOANHAPVIEN_ID , NGAYNHAPVIEN , THOIGIANNHAPVIEN , ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE , ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA , ICD_RAVIEN_CODE , ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA , CHUYENVIEN_ID , NGAYRAVIEN , THOIGIANRAVIEN , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #SOCAPCUU# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #LUUTRU_ID# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #NGAYCAPCUU# , #THOIGIANCAPCUU# , #NOICAPCUU_ID# , #NOINHAPVIEN_ID# , #BACSICAPCUU_ID# , #CHANDOANNGT# , #KETQUACAPCUU_ID# , #GHICHU# , #KHOANHAPVIEN_ID# , #NGAYNHAPVIEN# , #THOIGIANNHAPVIEN# , #ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE# , #ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA# , #ICD_RAVIEN_CODE# , #ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA# , #CHUYENVIEN_ID# , #NGAYRAVIEN# , #THOIGIANRAVIEN# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )
statements.update:
update TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU set SOCAPCUU = #SOCAPCUU# , TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , NGAYCAPCUU = #NGAYCAPCUU# , THOIGIANCAPCUU = #THOIGIANCAPCUU# , NOICAPCUU_ID = #NOICAPCUU_ID# , NOINHAPVIEN_ID = #NOINHAPVIEN_ID# , BACSICAPCUU_ID = #BACSICAPCUU_ID# , CHANDOANNGT = #CHANDOANNGT# , KETQUACAPCUU_ID = #KETQUACAPCUU_ID# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , KHOANHAPVIEN_ID = #KHOANHAPVIEN_ID# , NGAYNHAPVIEN = #NGAYNHAPVIEN# , THOIGIANNHAPVIEN = #THOIGIANNHAPVIEN# , ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE = #ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE# , ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA = #ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA# , ICD_RAVIEN_CODE = #ICD_RAVIEN_CODE# , ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA = #ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA# , CHUYENVIEN_ID = #CHUYENVIEN_ID# , NGAYRAVIEN = #NGAYRAVIEN# , THOIGIANRAVIEN = #THOIGIANRAVIEN#
, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where THONGTINCAPCUU_ID = '$THONGTINCAPCUU_ID$'

update TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU set SOCAPCUU = #SOCAPCUU#
TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID#
LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID#
BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID#
NGAYCAPCUU = #NGAYCAPCUU#
THOIGIANCAPCUU = #THOIGIANCAPCUU#
NOICAPCUU_ID = #NOICAPCUU_ID#
NOINHAPVIEN_ID = #NOINHAPVIEN_ID#
BACSICAPCUU_ID = #BACSICAPCUU_ID#
CHANDOANNGT = #CHANDOANNGT#
KETQUACAPCUU_ID = #KETQUACAPCUU_ID#
GHICHU = #GHICHU#
KHOANHAPVIEN_ID = #KHOANHAPVIEN_ID#
NGAYNHAPVIEN = #NGAYNHAPVIEN#
THOIGIANNHAPVIEN = #THOIGIANNHAPVIEN#
ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE = #ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE#
ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA = #ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA#
ICD_RAVIEN_CODE = #ICD_RAVIEN_CODE#
ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA = #ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA#
CHUYENVIEN_ID = #CHUYENVIEN_ID#
NGAYRAVIEN = #NGAYRAVIEN#
THOIGIANRAVIEN = #THOIGIANRAVIEN#
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
where BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THONGTINCAPCUU_ID = '$THONGTINCAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.SOCAPCUU = '$SOCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYCAPCUU = '$NGAYCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANCAPCUU = '$THOIGIANCAPCUU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NOICAPCUU_ID = '$NOICAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NOINHAPVIEN_ID = '$NOINHAPVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BACSICAPCUU_ID = '$BACSICAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.CHANDOANNGT = '$CHANDOANNGT$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.KETQUACAPCUU_ID = '$KETQUACAPCUU_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.KHOANHAPVIEN_ID = '$KHOANHAPVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYNHAPVIEN = '$NGAYNHAPVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANNHAPVIEN = '$THOIGIANNHAPVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE = '$ICD_NHAPVIEN_CODE$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA = '$ICD_NHAPVIEN_MOTA$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_RAVIEN_CODE = '$ICD_RAVIEN_CODE$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA = '$ICD_RAVIEN_MOTA$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.CHUYENVIEN_ID = '$CHUYENVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYRAVIEN = '$NGAYRAVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.THOIGIANRAVIEN = '$THOIGIANRAVIEN$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_TIEPNHAN_THONGTINCAPCUU.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
